function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Timely implementation of border control and closure of land and sea borders","Impact":"Containment of the virus may be compromised, leading to increased spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced testing and tracing systems, as well as strict quarantine measures","Technologies":"Smart testing and tracing technologies, border surveillance systems","People":"General population, travelers, border control authorities","Owner":"Government, health authorities, border control agencies"},{"Description":"Repurposing urban command and control centers for surveillance and tracing of infected individuals","Impact":"Failure to effectively monitor and control the spread of the virus within urban areas","Mitigation":"Investment in advanced monitoring and surveillance technologies, real-time data analysis, and rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Command and control center systems, real-time monitoring and surveillance tools","People":"Urban population, public health officials","Owner":"City government, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Repurposing integrated command and control centers as COVID-19 war rooms","Impact":"Lack of effective coordination and response to the pandemic at the city level","Mitigation":"Training and capacity building for coordinated response, deployment of dedicated pandemic response teams, and strategic resource allocation","Technologies":"Integrated command and control center systems, data analytics and visualization tools","People":"Public health officials, city administrators, emergency response teams","Owner":"City government, public health agencies"}]}
